titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: QUALIFICATION ATTAINMENT LEVEL FOR IMPROVING ACCESS TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPIES - Description

body.p: The QUALIFICATION or individual accreditation attained or planned to be attained by Care Personnel ( Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Care Professional or Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Employment Advisers), for the purposes of the Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Data Set .
